content: this pattern works will with most any 50 gram worsted weight ball of yarn errata in the thumb gusset instructions it says to repeat the three thumb gusset steps and gives a new stitch count for each repeat but it did not clarify the number of stitches you are actually knitting between the m1s in the first repeat you re doing k5 in the second you re doing k7 and in the last you re doing k9 i ve updated the pattern to reflect this clarification 5/12/11 if you would prefer to work this pattern flat check out the original version 1 of this pattern 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fast--easy-fingerless-mitts
